maqras.text: perfecit non argue people de scripture (Jews Christians Muslims) nicest possible moris! - unless they transgress - Dictus Nos believe in quod revealed nos in quod revealed vos noster deus tuus deus est 1 ac the same to Eum nos est submitters
Nos revealed vos hoc scripture those nos beatus proximus scripture believe in it Alias some de tuus people believe in it Indeed those disregard noster revelations est real disbelievers
Vos non read proximus scriptures nor perfecit vos scripsit them tuus manus! Tunc rejectors habet reason harbor doubts
In fact, these revelations est clear chests de those possess knowledge. Unus wicked testimentum disregard noster revelations
They dictus unus miracles advenit eum his Dominus! Dictus Totus miracles advenit unus ex DEUS; ego est non multus than manifest warner
Est it non satis de miracle nos sent down vos hoc book recited them? Hoc est indeed mercy reminder people qui believe
Dictus DEUS suffices prout testis me vos! He knows everything caelum terra. Surely those believe in falsehood disbelieve DEUS est real losers
They challenge vos bring retribution! Si est pro predetermined appointment retribution advenit them statim! Certainly it advenit them suddenly when they minus expect it
They challenge vos bring retribution! Hell iam surrounds disbelievers
Feria advenit when retribution overwhelms them ex supra them sub their feet He dictus Taste consequences tuus works
O My servus believed My terra est spacious ita worship Me
Everyone taste decessus tunc nos vos ultimately returned
Those believe lead righteous vita nos surely settle them Paradise mansions flowing streams Eternally they abide therein. Quod beautiful reward laborius
They est unus steadfastly persevere trust their Dominus
Multus creature non carry its provision DEUS provisus pro it alias prout pro vos. He est Hearer Omniscient
Vos ask them Qui created caelum terra put sun moon tuus service they dictus DEUS. perfecit tunc they deviate
DEUS est UNUS increases provision whomever He chooses His creatures withholds it DEUS est fully aware de TOTUS things
Vos ask them Qui sends caelum aqua revive denatus terra they dictus DEUS. Dictus Praise DEUS. Multus de them non understand
Hoc worldly vita est non multus than vanity play dum abode Hereafter est real vita they unus knew
When they ride ship they implore DEUS devoting their prayers Eum! prout soon prout He saves them shore they revert to idolatry
Let them disbelieve quod nos dedit them let them enjoy ex; temporanea; they perfecit surely invenit out
they non vide nos habet established Sanctus Sanctuary ut nos factus secure dum totus circiter them people est constant danger they adhuc believe in falsehood Would reject deus blessings
Qui malus than unus fabricates lies est attributes them DEUS rejects truth when it advenit eum? est Hell non just retribution disbelievers
Prout pro those strive in noster causa nos surely guide them noster paths! multus assuredly DEUS est cum the pius
